titles.title: Hatch-Waxman Integrity Act of 2019
Hatch-Waxman Integrity Act of 2019

A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to prevent the inter partes review process for challenging patents from diminishing competition in the pharmaceutical industry and with respect to drug innovation, and for other purposes.
Hatch-Waxman Integrity Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
